title: I just got an amazing penta kill - can i view it?
body:
Hi guys,

In the previous game i just played i made an amazing penta kill - for those interested in just how amazing, i was playing a jg Diana and all 4 members on my team had just died and the enemy team was moving in to finish the game (they were all high hp, this wasn't a dodgy clean up!) so i went back to fountain, healed and took them on to try save a 35 min game. Long story short i penta'd the team while my team was 9k gold behind at the time and i wasn't fed, just kinda normal.

But anyway, i was so focused on what i needed to do and dodging skill shots that i didn't really get to take in the fight and i barely even rememberer how it happened. hence why I'm here!

Is there any way i can view my previous game so i can watch this play - its probably the best play I've ever done in 4 years of playing and i barely even remember it because i was so stressed and focused.. lol

Please someone reply with some good news for me!! :)

Cheers

replies.body:
Hey there,

You might have luck with replay.gg, however I'm not sure if it will display replays from before you were registered with their service.

Give it a go anyway and let me know.

SephirothSG - You sir are a champion!! it worked!!! :D:D:D

I had never used that website before, but it had my game there for me to view!

Thanks so much SephirothSG, if i had a gold start sticker i would be placing it on your forehead right now.

Riot - if you are reading, give this man a little something special for me will you? :)

Cheers,
